name: Moloch
description:
Moloch is a roguelite without health points. Instead, it simulates basic health conditions of the player like bleeding, breaking your legs, or temperature. Inspired by Noita, it includes a variety of spells that can be put on wands, which can be used for attacking enemies. Or yourself. Most likely yourself.

If you like the game, you might consider joining its Discord Server!

Found a bug? Please report it as a GitHub Issue!
Want a new feature? You can suggest it here!

The game is currently in a very early stage, so a lot of bugs will be present and a lot of features might be very incomplete. It's hard for me to tell which fixes and features would be more important for a player, so all your feedback is appreciated.
